description.value: Character does not suffer penalties to Fellowship Tests due to being an Ogryn and/or not being taken seriously, and can re-roll one failed Charm Test per game session.

system.benefit: Character does not suffer penalties to Fellowship Tests due to being an Ogryn and/or not being taken seriously, and can re-roll one failed Charm Test per game session.

specialAbilities.name: Ogryn Respect
specialAbilities.description: Do not suffer penalties for being an Ogryn or not being taken seriously. Can re-roll one failed Charm Test per session.
